overview: Jiyoung and Jin are the closest of friends. Following a visit to a bar together one night, the two of them decide to have another drink at Jiyoung's house.  Out of ordinary, Jin is exceptionally drunk and suggests Jiyoung to a game of truth or dare in the midst of complicated emotional turmoil, thereby beginning a revealing series of truths and dares between the two.
title: Truth or Dare
